about_the_game:
Only the chosen can earn Missy's favour...



The Velvet Deluxe Pass is a long-term customisation unlock for Missy's Transformation Tournament, giving you exclusive access to:

UNLOCKED CHARACTER CREATOR
Velvet Deluxe Pass players will be able to change their entire body, including arms, legs, torso and others, all in the character creator, allowing you to start the game with your favourite mutations, even as a different species altogether!

PASSWORD POWERS
Velvet Deluxe Pass players will gain access to an in-game passwords system, allowing access to various secret content, bonus features and extra customisation to your tournaments! Make everyone's arms disappear, change the colour of the UI and uncover secrets into the world of Missy.

CHEAT SCREEN
Velvet Deluxe Pass players will gain access to an exclusive cheat screen that allows for free health, body restorations and instant transformations! As well as powerful tools that can transform every contestant in the tournament.

The Velvet Deluxe Pass is a great way to expand your experience in the game and to show your support!

content_descriptors.notes: Missy's Transformation Tournament features frequent nudity and some non-graphic sexual themes.

short_description: Your pass to the ultimate Missy's Transformation Tournament experience! Features a complete and unlocked character creator, a password system filled with secrets and an all-powerful cheat screen. Have a taste of the power that Missy wields!
